inclusion.criterion: In regular HIV care follow-up (min. 2 consultations in the last six months prior to the study)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: HIV patients with currently taking Hepatitis C treatment or with a history of prior hepatitis C treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is on IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months, but direct antiviral drugs were added to his treatment 6 months ago.
